entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain or periods of snow changing to flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening.
